channel.title: Ok, I'm just sick and tired now
channel.description:
I've been looking around lately, and what people don't realise these days is that most of the servers that are being posted up on moparscape are leeched servers. I'm just tired of looking at leeched posts of PI sources, all people change these days is the home location or the npc locations. Recently (like 5 mins ago) I just pointed out 2 leeched servers, a dementhium leech which was NOT even asked for permission to post on Mopar, plus the idiot did not even know what Java was, he claimed to add things that were already coded onto the base. He didn't even bother looking at the source.
And another one was a leech of IntDubPk, only with shops + home changed. And the funny thing is that people actually congratulate these noobs, and Rep them which just makes me feel like shooting them.
What I feel is that there should be a proper form of posting a server, and if these certain req's aren't filled then the topic should be deleted plus and infraction.
Does anyone agree with what I am tryin' to point out?

item.title: Ok, I'm just sick and tired now
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:43, topic:396077”][quote author=iz3 legend link=topic=493257.msg3607875#msg3607875 date=1306282400]
I think there should be 4 blank downloads in server downloads:

  1. A blank delta and client
  2. A blank PI and client
  3. A blank Hyperion and client
  4. A black shards and client

That way people cant leech, they are forced to code and come up with their own ideas. Because everything is a hybridpvp leech now. Go check google/google/mopar status its all leeched. Not one original idea on that board.
[/quote]I believe you’re forgetting PimpScape. But I like the idea. Maybe a sub-forum for the shitty leeched ones.[/quote]
but then everyone would flock happily to the sub-forum >_> now that doesn’t help does it

Read full topic

item.title: Ok, I'm just sick and tired now
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Yes, I am feeling sick and tired as well. My temperature is running high, about one degree higher I believe. My throat is also killing me, with every movement I make burning it like a fire being stoked by the servant. It is really very painful and I would not wish this on even my worst enemy.

ps these posts remind me of the “remember when /b/ was nice” image where Uncle Scrooge responds with “/b/ was never nice…”, I’ll try to dig the picture up from somewhere.

Read full topic
